author: ausiv
content: Is anyone concerned that Goerli stopped processing blocks a few hours before dencun is scheduled for mainnet? I'm guessing it's just validators going offline, but the timing seems a little concerning.

author: pk910
content:
There were a lot operators shutting down their validators in the last weeks.
This is not related to the upcoming fork, it's more because goerli is deprecated and about to be phased out soon.
Unfortunately the long unfinality leads to a much higher processing time for the remaining active clients, which kind of cascades to the even worse situation we currently see.
Nothing to worry about,  just a dying network  <:rip:847932976212738048>

author: ausiv
content: That's what I was guessing, the timing was just a bit worrying. Thanks!
